alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:27AM CDT until April 03 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam affecting Pulaski and Ballard Counties. Ohio River at Cairo affecting Ballard, Hickman, Fulton, Pulaski, Mississippi, Carlisle and Alexander Counties. For the Ohio River...including Smithland Dam, Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 42.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday morning and continue falling to 32.5 feet Monday, April 10. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
